metadata.dc:title: Climate Data Converted to HDF5
metadata.dc:creator: JJ Wagner
metadata.dc:subject: Climate dataset; HDF5; data preservation
metadata.dc:description: This describes an HDF5 representation of the Climate dataset containing measurments of global average annual CO2 concentration (in ppm), mean annual New York Temperature in Celsius, and global mean sea level with cycles removed from 1856 to present. The original tabular data was converted from CSV form for the purpose of preservation and access. The HDF5 file stores the feature data and original metadata in seperate folders, preserving all the information. No transformations were made beside the format conversion, except for standard typ casting needed for HDF5.
metadata.dc:source: Our group Climate Data from Assignment 2. It was obtained from the following github repository: https://github.com/jawyere/Climate-Trends---Data-Science-Assignment-2
metadata.dc:relation: Notebooks or scripts used for conversion to HDF5
metadata.dc:rights: This repository (code, conversion scripts, and packaging) is distributed under the MIT License. See the LICENSE file for details. Users are responsible for ensuring that their use of the underlying Iris dataset complies with any applicable terms or restrictions.
